reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2024
reviews.comment: These Ring Cameras work Good! We love our new spotlight camera! The only about the Ring Doorbell was it was a little difficult putting on the door it's now on the wall on the side of the door! Apparently when you have a older ring doorbell when you upgrade to a newer model it doesn't have the same place screw holes and had to make New 1's!! Read more

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works fine

reviews.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Need to buy RINGER!!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2025
reviews.comment: Hellooo??? If you buy a Door Bell one expects to hear a door ring bell.. well, NO, you have to BUY ANOTHER THING FOR IT TO RING.... Really disappointed and dissatisfied! Read more

reviews.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars I like the product, but once the 30 day trial ends...
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2024
reviews.comment: you have to pay for coverage on each and every device. There is no way to have the video save to your phone without paying monthly for the service. Definite downside. Also the camera is very sensitive and chimes every time a leaf blows by, or particles of dust in my garage when we were trying to catch our cats doing something. Read more
